sentences: Elizabeth Norman McKay (née Norman) (1931 – 20 May 2018) was an English musicologist, pianist and Lieder accompanist.
McKay graduated from Lawnswood High School in Leeds in 1947/48.
She gained a degree in Physics from Bristol University, and worked in London as a pianist, accompanist, and repetiteur.
In 1962 she was awarded a D. Phil.
1991 Franz Schubert's music for the theatre
1998 Schubert's string and piano duos in context
2009 Schubert : the piano and dark keys
